trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Jelenti. a beállításokat, amelyek állíthat be egy <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>XSD-sémák generálása egy típus vagy a szerelvény szolgál.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Importálás és exportálás sémákat, lásd: [séma importálásának és exportálásának](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) és [exportálása sémák osztályoktól](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a szerializálási helyettesítő.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: Megvalósítása a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"> </xref> felület, amely segítségével testre szabhatja, egy XML-séma leképezése egy adott típus exportálásának módját.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyűjteményt, amelyek előfordulhatnak szerializálás vagy deszerializálás közben.

trans-unit.source: The KnownTypes property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property).
trans-unit.target: A KnownTypes tulajdonságot használja a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>olvasható típusok foglalandó objektumdiagram (segítségével a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""></xref> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""> </xref> gyűjteményt, amely olyan típusokat tartalmaz, a szerializálás vagy deszerializálás során fordulhatnak elő.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ez a gyűjtemény által megadott összes típusához exportált XML-séma felelősséget a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>.
